short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable comments section on YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn off the comments section & Live chat section on YouTube videos. This way, you can concentrate on watching the content without getting distracted by comments. Give it a try to maximize the benefits of using YouTube to improve your life. It's all about staying focused.
